title: What OS X I can install here?
message:
I have here this iMac to reinstall

[url]https://everymac.com/systems/apple/imac/specs/imac-core-2-duo-1.83-17-inch-specs.html[/url]

I tried to put 10.6 but didnot recognize the usb pen-drive. What OS X I can install?

title: What OS X I can install here?
message: 10.4, 10.5 and 10.6 willwordforsure. burn image onto DVD to install.

title: What OS X I can install here?
What OS X I can install here?
message: 10.6 through USB will work fine. These machines belong in the garbage though.....
